# Positional and Keyword Arguments

```{python}
def my_func(a, b, c):
  print("a = {0}, b = {1}, c = {2}".format(a, b, c))

my_func(3, 2, 4)
```

```{python}
def my_func(a, b, c = 3):
  print("a = {0}, b = {1}, c = {2}".format(a, b, c))

my_func(3, 2)
```

```{python}
def my_func(b = 1, a = 2, c = 3):
  print("a = {0}, b = {1}, c = {2}".format(a, b, c))

my_func()
my_func(10, a = 30, c = 20)
my_func(10, c = 30)
```
